features: Skin Harmony: Whether you're dealing with oily or dry skin, this ginseng essence water serves as a gentle astringent, toner, and hydrating solution, leaving your face feeling revitalized and glowing.

K-Beauty Essential: Elevate your personal care routine with Beauty of Joseon, where traditional Korean skincare meets modern beauty. A perfect fusion of toner, moisturizer, and essence, making it the best in Korean skincare.
Key Ingredients: Ginseng Water 80% for moisturizing and energizing the skin with full nutrition. Niacinamide 2% for Niacinamide 2% for skin barrier, tone up, pore closing. BHA 0.5% for exfoliating

[Ginseng hydration] Ginseng is a vital herbal ingredient that has been used for a long time for our body and skin health. It contains 80% of ginseng water and focuses on the benefits of ginseng itself, giving sufficient moisture and nutrition to the skin. It fills moisture and nutrition firmly to help keep your skin moisturized for a long period of time.

Great Gift: Perfect for grand parents, moms, dads, girlfriends and boyfriends as a birthday gift and event for special occasions. Present your loved ones with this ginseng essence water korean skincare.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Ginseng Vitality 2 Radiant Skin Tone 3 Long Lasting Moisture

Key Ingredients 80% Ginseng Root Water Our essence features a remarkable 80% Ginseng Root Water, harnessing the age-old power of Ginseng known for deep skin hydration and nourishment. 2% Niacinamide Niacinamide, at 2%, is your ally in controlling sebum, preserving oil-moisture balance, and promoting a youthful, radiant complexion.

Is Ginseng Essence Water suitable for all skin types? Absolutely! Our Ginseng Essence Water is designed to be gentle and effective for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The natural properties of Ginseng and the addition of Niacinamide make it a soothing and calming choice How often should I use this product in my skincare routine? For optimal results, we recommend using Ginseng Essence Water daily. Incorporate it as a crucial step in your morning and evening skincare routine after cleansing. This consistency ensures you'll reap the full benefits of the product. Is this product cruelty-free ? Our Ginseng Essence Water is cruelty-free and does not involve animal testing. How do I know if this product is authentic? Please make sure you are purchasing the product from the only official seller: BEAUTY OF JOSEON OFFICIAL. We can not promise the authenticity of products purchased from other sellers other than BEAUTY OF JOSEON OFFICIAL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it so far
reviews.reviewText: SHORT TAKE: I don't find this to be moisturizing by itself but it does help my actual moisturizer work so much better. I love the ingredients (as you can tell from reading the rest of the review!) I'm a fan of K-beauty but not everything I've tried works as well as this does so far. I also love that there's no discernable scent. This was nicely packaged & had a good foil seal on it.1st IMPRESSION: The "water" doesn't evaporate on the back of my hand immediately and I can see that it doesn't take but a couple of "dots" of the product to cover most of my face so the bottle should last for a while. After I tried this for the first time, I found it to be slightly tightening on my skin & worried that it might be drying so I wasn't sure about it. When checking the ingredients via INCIdecoder.com (which I usually do BEFORE I buy something), I decided to keep using the product for a while to see how things go. Because parts of the writing on the box and on the bottle are in Korean (because it is made in Korea :-), I used Translate to check (see photos). I love that the bottle came very well sealed.Goals: I am 61 with decent skin that is a combo of dry/very dry. I am starting to see fine lines across the forehead and small brown spots. Also, my skin has been feeling dryer and more "tired". I'm not trying to be young again but I want something to use along with my moisturizer to help keep my skin clear & balanced no matter my age.VALUE: It doesn't take much of this to treat my face and neck so I think it's a good value. The bottle is going to last a while even with my using it morning and evening.INGREDIENTS: Since this is "ginseng essence water", I wanted to know where the ginseng ingredients fell on the whole list. #1 is Panax ginseng root water so that's somethin; #5 is water; #13 is 13. Panax ginseng callus culture extract; #13 is 17. Panax ginseng root extract; and #18 is Panax ginseng berry extract. I also notice that there is some Theobroma cacao(cocoa) extract as ingredient #14. 3 of the first 4 are either considered to be moisturizing or humectant & the 7th ingredient is water. Of all 24 ingredients, 10 are moisturizing or humectant and/or a "skin-identical" ingredient.MY ROUTINE: Wash, pat dry, and use this product(especially around my nose) before using a Manuka honey serum and a moisturizer. When I finished my full routine, I noticed that my skin felt slightly tingly - but not unpleasant. My face is moisturized but not oily and feels really good to the touch. The photo is with no makeup. I'm going to keep an eye on the "tingly" feeling because that could be good or not.I will keep trying this for a while because I think my skin is just getting used to it. I like the way my face feels - moist but not oily and very refreshed and "awake". There isn't any irritation so I'm optimistic.I will come back to update this after I've used the product in my routine for a couple of weeks.The full list of ingredients on the label are: Panax ginseng root water, Butylene glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Hydroxyacetophenone, Glyceryl glucoside, Xanthan gum, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Allantoin, Adenosine, Panax ginseng callus culture extract, Theobroma, cacao(cocoa) extract, Dextrin, Glucose, Panax ginseng root extract, Panax ginseng berry extract, Lactobacillus/Panax ginseng root ferment filtrate, Sodium hyaluronate, Ethylhexyglycerin, Disodium EDTA.I REALLY like this & when I checked the INCI Decoder site & learned more about what each ingredient does, I know why. ( Anti-acne: Niacinamide; Antioxidant: Panax Ginseng Root Extract; Cell-communicating ingredient: Niacinamide, Adenosine; Skin brightening: Niacinamide; Skin-identical ingredient: Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate; Soothing: Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, AllantoinShow all ingredients by function; Other Ingredients- Antioxidant: Hydroxyacetophenone; Chelating: Disodium EDTA; Emollient: Panax Ginseng Root Extract; Moisturizer/humectant: Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Glyceryl Glucoside, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Dextrin, Glucose, Sodium Hyaluronate; Preservative: Ethylhexylglycerin; Solvent: Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water Viscosity controlling: Xanthan Gum; Dextrin.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My #1 Skin care line
reviews.reviewText: I rave about Beauty by Joseon products because they are just great and the price is not bad.The Ginseng Essence Water, brings a cool freshness to the skin, I like using it after washing my face with the Ginseng oil wash.My skin has tone has even out. I'm truly loving this line of products.Now you try it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add it to your regime(n) 🫡🫡🫡
reviews.reviewText: I’m starting a Korean skincare regimen but am on a budget that’s tighter than a little tiny crevasse that someone might get their limb stuck in while rock climbing and eventually have to self-amputate. Since I’m unable to shell out an arm or a leg, I decided to give this product a try.The whole point of essence is to prep your face for the moisture and goo to come, and let me tell you that just TWO drops of this stuff will give your face a sticky feeling that bodes well for gripping the heck out of whatever might come next (it’s serum).There’s no smell and it doesn’t burn, however I haven’t tried drinking it or putting it in my eyes, as this is not part of any skincare routine as far as I know. My skin has had no negative reaction to it whatsoever.Only downside: My very stinky older sister dropped the cap and it cracked so now I won’t be able to travel with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't irritate my highly sensitive skin at all. Very soothing and skin looks better overall.
Mir gefällt der Toner sehr gut, obwohl er etwas nach altem Reiswasser riecht. Der Geruch verfliegt aber schnell. Ich habe das Gefühl, daß meine Haut nach der Anwendung frischer und praller ist.
Il prodotto ho un buon profumo e lascia la pelle morbida ed idratata.
Siempre la utilizo , me rehidrata la piel
